entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a student at Hogwarts who loses his wand and tries to retrieve it.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy jumps out of range of Hermione's Stunning Spell.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron shoots a Body-Bind Curse at Crabbe and appears suddenly at the end of the aisle.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe screams 'Avada Kedavra!' again and runs up the aisle toward Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione charges toward Malfoy and Goyle with a Stunning Spell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry points at the pile of junk where the old tiara had fallen and yells for Hermione to look for it while he goes to help Ron.

entities.name: r
entities.description: R is someone Harry wants to go and help.

entities.name: avada kedavra
entities.description: Avada Kedavra is a spell cast by Crabbe.

entities.name: body-bind curse
entities.description: Ron shoots a Body-Bind Curse at Crabbe.

relationships.description: Harry wants to go and help R.
Ron shoots a Body-Bind Curse at Crabbe.
Hermione charges toward Malfoy with a Stunning Spell.
Harry yells for Hermione to look for the old tiara while he goes to help Ron and Goyle.
Crabbe runs up the aisle toward Harry, who is with Ron.
Hermione hits Goyle with a Stunning Spell.
